title: [Neuroscience] New study adds to evidence that Parkinson's disease starts in the gut - what triggers initial gut changes in Parkinson’s may be a misdirected immune attack as shown in mice. This raises the possibility that early detection interruption of the immune response in the gut could prevent Parkinson’s.
[Health] Amid US’s shameful maternal death rate, study finds widespread mistreatment | One in five report mistreatment and 30% report discrimination
